statements: SELECT * FROM Events
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM Events WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT event_name, notification_sent FROM Events WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE user_id = 123 AND notification_sent = TRUE
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM Events WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_name ASC
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_name LIKE 'Meeting%' AND notification_sent = FALSE
SELECT user_id, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM Events GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_events > 2 ORDER BY total_events DESC
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT notification_id, notification_date, message FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, description FROM events WHERE event_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT event_name, event_date, description FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, description FROM events LEFT JOIN notifications ON events.event_id = notifications.event_id WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT event_name, event_date, COUNT(notification_id) AS notification_count FROM events LEFT JOIN notifications ON events.event_id = notifications.event_id GROUP BY event_name, event_date;

SELECT event_name, notification_date FROM events JOIN notifications ON events.event_id = notifications.event_id WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY notification_date ASC, event_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, description, notification_id FROM events JOIN notifications ON events.event_id = notifications.event_id WHERE event_date <= CURDATE() ORDER BY notification_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM events ORDER BY event_type
SELECT u.username, n.message FROM users u JOIN notifications n ON u.id = n.user_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN notifications ON users.id = notifications.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT message, created_at FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE 'Tech%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE created_at >= '2022-03-01' AND trigger_type = 'error';
SELECT u.username, n.message FROM users u JOIN notifications n ON u.id = n.user_id WHERE n.created_at >= '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM UserNotifications
SELECT id, user_id, message, timestamp FROM AnomalyEvents ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT message, timestamp FROM UserNotifications WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT id, event_type, timestamp FROM SubscriptionEvents WHERE event_type = 'payment'
SELECT id, source_table, event_type FROM EventLog
SELECT * FROM UserNotifications WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM OrderStatus WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, description, timestamp FROM AnomalyEvents WHERE severity >= 3 AND description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT user_id, event_type, timestamp FROM SubscriptionEvents WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT source_table, event_type FROM EventLog WHERE event_type = 'insert' AND source_table IN ('UserNotifications', 'OrderStatus') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
